snippet: The big stock indexes returned to nominal highs after the Bank of Japan unexpectedly announced a fresh stimulus to bolster the country’s flagging economy.
abstract: Stock markets rebound and close at new highs on last day of October.
lead_paragraph: The big stock indexes returned to nominal highs after the Bank of Japan unexpectedly announced a fresh stimulus to bolster the country’s flagging economy.

headline.main: Market Closes Up With a Big Assist From the Bank of Japan
headline.print_headline: Seesaw October Ends With New Highs
